com.hazelcast.map.impl.event

Interface FilteringStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilteringStrategy, DefaultEntryEventFilteringStrategy, QueryCacheNaturalFilteringStrategy

    public interface FilteringStrategy
    A filtering strategy determines whether an event must be published based on a specific filter and if so, may alter the type of event that should be published.
    See Also:
    AbstractFilteringStrategy, DefaultEntryEventFilteringStrategy, QueryCacheNaturalFilteringStrategy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FILTER_DOES_NOT_MATCH
      Used as return value from doFilter(EventFilter, Data, Object, Object, EntryEventType, String) to indicate that an event registration's filter does not match.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int doFilter(EventFilter filter, Data dataKey, Object dataOldValue, Object dataValue, EntryEventType eventType, String mapNameOrNull)
      Main entry point for filtering events according to given filter.
      EntryEventDataCache getEntryEventDataCache() 

    • Field Detail

      • FILTER_DOES_NOT_MATCH

        static final int FILTER_DOES_NOT_MATCH
        Used as return value from doFilter(EventFilter, Data, Object, Object, EntryEventType, String) to indicate that an event registration's filter does not match.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • doFilter

        int doFilter(EventFilter filter,
             Data dataKey,
             Object dataOldValue,
             Object dataValue,
             EntryEventType eventType,
             String mapNameOrNull)
        Main entry point for filtering events according to given filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the event filter
        dataKey - the event entry key
        dataOldValue - the old value of the event entry
        dataValue - the new value of the event entry
        eventType - the event type
        mapNameOrNull - the map name. May be null if this is not a map event (e.g. cache event)
        Returns:
        FILTER_DOES_NOT_MATCH if the event does not match the filter, otherwise the integer event type of the event to be published. This allows a filtering strategy to alter the type of event that is actually published, depending on the attributes of the individual event registration.

      • getEntryEventDataCache

        EntryEventDataCache getEntryEventDataCache()
        Returns:
        a new instance of EntryEventDataCache implementation to be used with this filtering strategy
